info.description: Kanban Tool is an intuitive project management service for real-time collaboration. By splitting work into stages, e.g. To do - Doing - Done, teams get a visual representation of the process and status of all tasks. Unlimited boards with swimlanes and WIP limits. In-depth customization of the layout, card template, and process automation. Task assignments and comments. Seamless time tracking & reporting. iOS and Android apps and much more!
info.title: Kanban Tool

get.description: This operation gets a board activities.
This operation gets a task comments.
This operation gets a board details.
